Spascriptions Hydrating Cream Mask, Fragrance Free

Brand: Spa Scriptions

Category: Mask

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, SEA SILT, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, SALT MINE MUD, GLYCERIN, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, BEESWAX, IRON OXIDES, PEG-100 STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, NYMPHAEA ALBA FLOWER EXTRACT, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, XANTHAN GUM, PHENOXYETHANOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID,

STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, NYMPHAEA ALBA FLOWER EXTRACT, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, XANTHAN GUM, PHENOXYETHANOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, IODOPROPYNYL BUTYLCARBAMATE, CI 77007
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
